name: Latke89.GitHub.io
body:
After working hard since graduation to reduce my student loan obligations, I am now ready to pursue a career more
focused on my passion for learning and education in a tech-driven environment.  

  
## About Me
Music Educator turned Manager turned Java Programmer who wants to make a difference in the world. Hobbies include reading, tabletop and card games, and building models. I love to learn how things work, and programming really scratches that itch.

## Skills
* Back End
  * Java, JavaFX, Threads, Sockets, JDBC, Hibernate, Spring Boot, JUnit
* Front End
  * Javascript, AngularJS, CSS, Audiolet, Teoria, Vexflow, Mustache
* Miscellaneous
  * Test Driven Development, Agile Development, Git, Github

## Projects
* [Ear Trainer](ear-training-application.herokuapp.com)
  * A tool for musicians to learn how to identify intervals and scales through Aural training, and a game-like interface. Tools used include Java, PostgreSQL, Spring Framework, RESTful Web Services, Angular JavaScript, Bootstrap, Audiolet, Teoria, and Vexflow.
* Angular Web Chat
  * This is an online chatroom using a server and client relationship, uses a database to
store the chat history, and uses AngularJS to dynamically change the page as soon as a change is created.
Created using Spring Framework, RESTful Web Services, PostgreSQL, AngularJS, and Java.
* Bank
  * Users can create either a Checking, Savings, or Retirement account, withdraw or deposit money,
view a list of accounts, choose an account by name, and transfer money between two of their accounts.
Uses threads to accrue interest on money in both Savings and Retirement accounts. There is a read/write
function that saves user data between sessions. Technologies include Threads, Read/Write, Interfaces, and
Java.

## Education
Columbus State University, Joyce and Henry Schwob School of Music Columbus, GA 2007 - 2012
Bachelors of Arts in Music
